long_description: The Black Diamond Voyager lantern lights up your camp with a soft glow, and it has the added ability to be used as a flashlight when you're hiking around at night. Features 2 high-output DoublePower LEDs-1 for using the Voyager as a lantern around camp and the other for using the unit as a flashlight while hiking. LEDs can be turned on at the same time to eliminate the dark spot that you generally see below a hanging lantern. DoublePower lantern LED outputs 75 lumens to light up your campsite; DoublePower flashlight LED brightens the trail with 50 lumens. Fine-tune the output of either LED with the dimming switch-simply hold down the on/off button to activate dimmer. Lantern illuminates an area approximately 32 ft. in diameter. Collapsible design saves space in your pack and protects on/off button from accidental activation. Double-hook hanging system on top provides a simple and secure thread-through or clip-in attachment point for string, fabric loops or branches. IPX4 water-resistant construction delivers reliability in inclement weather. Rubber feet stabilize lantern when set on table or ground. 4 AA batteries, sold separately, power the Black Diamond Voyager lantern for up to 100 hrs. on low and 13 hrs. on high.
short_description: The Black Diamond Voyager lantern lights up your camp with a soft glow, and it has the added ability to be used as a flashlight when you're hiking around at night.
